actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore and make permanent the deduction for charitable contributions by nonitemizers.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the deduction for charitable contributions by taxpayers who do not itemize deductions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore and make permanent the deduction for charitable contributions by nonitemizers.
